title: Advertising details information

xdm:name.title: Ad Name
xdm:name.description: The friendly and human-readable name of the ad asset.

xdm:ID.title: Ad ID
xdm:ID.description: Identifier of the ad asset provided by media analytics customers. Following the Ad-ID standard [https://www.ad-id.org].

xdm:length.title: Ad Length Or Duration
xdm:length.description: Length or duration of ad asset in seconds.

xdm:podPosition.title: Ad In Pod Position (Ad Start)
xdm:podPosition.description: The index of the ad inside the parent ad start, for example, the first ad has index 0 and the second ad has index 1.

xdm:playerName.title: Ad Player Name
xdm:playerName.description: The name of the player responsible for rendering the ad.

xdm:advertiser.title: Ad Advertiser
xdm:advertiser.description: Company/Brand whose product is featured in the ad.

xdm:creativeID.title: Ad Creative ID
xdm:creativeID.description: The ID of the ad creative.

xdm:creativeURL.title: Ad Creative URL
xdm:creativeURL.description: The URL of the ad creative.

xdm:timePlayed.title: Ad Time Played
xdm:timePlayed.description: The total amount of time, in seconds, spent watching the ad (i.e., the number of seconds played).
